channel.title: House of Peregrine
channel.description: Recent content on House of Peregrine

item.title: About
item.description: House of Peregrine is about co-creating. Original products, content, and events crafted by and for those that relish in the tension of being from abroad and having a unique definition of home. “Expat. Migrant. Pioneer.” None were a fit but Peregrine fits our ethos perfectly. Those that craft their life-story, with intention.
